attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election, we have no faith in the Government.
attributes.additional_details:
Numerous votes of no confidence have been tabled by both parties, but no one has thought to ask what the people want.

We the People vote them into power, we the People should be able to vote them out.

Therefore, this petition is our formal notice of no confidence, which will require an immediate General Election to be called before the current Government is allowed to do anymore damage, to our once great country.
attributes.background:
The Government has let us down, the country is a mess constant austerity is smothering our services knife crime is up homelessness is at an all time high, the pound is at an all time low and Brexit is a shambles.

We require an immediate General Election as we have no faith in the current leaders.
